title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, May 6, 2020
description: It was on this day in 1994 that the Channel Tunnel (or the "Chunnel") opened, making it possible to travel from London to Paris in less than three hours.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day in 1994 that the Channel Tunnel (or the "Chunnel") opened, making it possible to travel from London to Paris in less than three hours.
